fields.request: Manual QA: Verify Send Net Message admin form single-column layout
fields.request_details:
1. Navigate to the Send Net Message admin view and confirm the form renders all fieldsets in a single column without side-by-side sections.
2. Enter a subject and body, select any filters, and submit to verify the layout does not shift when validation messages appear.
3. Resize the window to confirm the form remains single column at all breakpoints.
